data.name: Exceptions.FileNotFound
data.value: Unable to locate file {x}. If the file previously existed it may have been moved or deleted.

data.name: Exceptions.DirectoryNotFound
data.value: Unable to locate directory {x}. If this directory previously existed it may have been moved or deleted.

data.name: EmptyDirectory.Deleted
data.value: {x}, which was an Empty Directory, was deleted.

data.name: Exceptions.NoArgumentsProvided
data.value: No files or directories were provided.

data.name: Command.Delete.Single.Description
data.value: Delete a file or director either recursively or non-recursively.

data.name: DeleteConfrmation.File
data.value: Do you want file {x} to be deleted?

data.name: DeleteConfirmation.Directory
data.value: Do you want directory {x} to be deleted?

data.name: DeleteConfirmation.YesOrNo
data.value: Enter Y for yes OR N for no.

data.name: Exceptions.InvalidDeleteConfirmation
data.value: An invalid value was provided. Please try again.

data.name: Command.Delete.Many.Description
data.value: Delete files or directories either recursively or non-recursively.

data.name: Exceptions.InvalidArgumentsProvided
data.value: An invalid file or directory was passed as an argument.

data.name: Exceptions.InvalidSlashArgument
data.value: The directory argument passed is not allowed in this program for the safety of your system.
